Content.Text:
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You can handle it, okay? You do it!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No, Master Amir, that is not okay.
Please, you have to understand.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
We're done here.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Master Amir! We aren't finished here
yet! Wait, please!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Master Amir, I'm coming in.
What's up with the two of them?
I'll just listen in a little
I'd better leave
...going home... tomorrow...
Yes... I understand...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Who's there!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please, Ms. <MYNAME>, calm down. Do you
want something to drink?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong? You look pale. Are you
feeling sick?
Don't leave!
You two shouldn't be fighting!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Leave...? What's this all of a sudden?
What are you talking about?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you overhear some of that
conversation?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. But that is still most strange.
<PAGE>
There was nothing about Master Amir
going back home.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
What exactly did you hear, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I see! I can see how it might have
sounded like that, if you didn't hear it
all.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Indeed. I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. I think I've
caused you to over worry.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As it happens, one of Master Amir's
cousins has given birth to a baby.
<PAGE>
So I was just suggesting to him that
he write a letter of congratulations.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is what Sanjay said: "Seeing as you
aren't going home, why don't you write
a letter tomorrow?"

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah! Your face is bright red,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You don't have to apologize. I was
surprised, but this has also made your
feelings for me clear, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Indeed. You are a lucky individual,
Master Amir.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
We're finally home. Are you feeling a
little better now, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even if I ever had to go home, in an
emergency or whatever, I have you here
waiting for me. I'll always come back.
<PAGE>
If you really are worried, then you can
always come back with me!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I said before that I'd send a letter
telling my family about us, right?
<PAGE>
My father and mother both very much want
to meet you. They said, "Bring her to
meet us."
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If it's okay with you... would you come
and meet with my parents?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. I'm so happy to hear you say
that.
<PAGE>
I'll let them know that we will be
taking a trip sometime soon.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm going home. See you soon, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
A fight? Me and Sanjay?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I assure you, we were doing nothing of
the sort.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, I'm sorry. I've got a letter to
write. Could you leave me alone today?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very well. Ms. <MYNAME>, I will see you to
the door.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see... you only heard a few parts,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
We weren't fighting. I was just asking
him to write a letter by tomorrow.
<PAGE>
It's nothing for you to worry about, Ms.
<MYNAME>. Do not worry.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't agree with eavesdropping,
however. I hope you will respect our
privacy in the future.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see that you understand. I will let
Master Amir know that you did not mean
anything by your comments.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please take care on your way home.
Sanjay, what is it?

No, it's just... I thought I saw someone
there. But I guess I was imagining
things.
